article.Heading: Young Turks: Budget Special & Aavishkaar-Intellecap Grp
article.Summary: Watch accompanying videos of Young Turks - Budget Special to know what Start-Up Inc and budding entrepreneurs are expecting from the Union Budget.
article.Body:
Watch accompanying videos of Young Turks - Budget Special to know what Start-Up Inc and budding entrepreneurs are expecting from the Union Budget.

Also Watch Aavishkaar-Intellecap Group talking about the equity that the group has raised of USD 25 million led by Triodos Investment Management and Shell Foundation.
